title: [Large-Scale] Field-Based Geospatial Science Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of introductory GIS concepts and personal device (smartphone/tablet) utilization skills
context.additional_context: Learner group comprising professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, focusing on acquiring practical GIS skills through field data collection and analysis

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect spatial data using mobile devices in local survey areas.
Learners can analyze collected data with GIS software to generate maps and statistical reports.
Learners can perform shared data management and collaborative processes through team-based projects.
Learners can propose practical solutions to real-world problems based on analytical results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
